name: ai.brackets-build-system
title: Brackets Build System
description: Allows to execute commands via keyboard shortcuts & menu items to build programmes written in any programming language or even just to run a command. Made possible thanks to Anton Ivanov the creator of Command Line Shortcuts Extension.
author: Ayman Izzedlin <ayman.izzeldin@gmail.com> (https://github.com/aymanizz)
